price: Primat će ono što im Gospodar njihov bude darovao, jer oni su prije toga dobra djela činili,
arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥ'sinīna
